statements: SELECT * FROM employee_performance;
SELECT employee_id, evaluation_date FROM employee_performance;
SELECT * FROM employee_performance WHERE evaluation_score > 80;
SELECT employee_id, evaluation_date, evaluation_score FROM employee_performance WHERE evaluation_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT employee_id, evaluation_score FROM employee_performance ORDER BY evaluation_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_performance WHERE evaluation_score >= 80;
SELECT employee_id, evaluation_date, evaluation_score FROM employee_performance WHERE evaluation_score < 70 ORDER BY evaluation_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, training_records FROM employee_performance WHERE LENGTH(training_records) > 0;
SELECT * FROM employee_performance WHERE evaluation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT employee_id, evaluation_score, training_records FROM employee_performance WHERE training_records IS NOT NULL AND evaluation_score < 90 ORDER BY evaluation_score ASC, evaluation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_performance WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT employee_id, evaluation_date, rating FROM employee_performance WHERE employee_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM training_records WHERE training_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT training_topic, duration_hours, trainer_name FROM training_records ORDER BY duration_hours DESC;
SELECT employee_id, training_topic, trainer_name FROM training_records WHERE employee_id IN (1001, 1003);
SELECT * FROM employee_performance WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY evaluation_date DESC

SELECT employee_id, rating, training_topic FROM employee_performance INNER JOIN training_records ON employee_performance.employee_id = training_records.employee_id WHERE training_topic LIKE '%SQL%' ORDER BY training_date
SELECT DISTINCT employee_id, evaluation_date FROM employee_performance WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY employee_id, evaluation_date
SELECT employee_id, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM employee_performance GROUP BY employee_id HAVING AVG(rating) > 3 ORDER BY avg_rating DESC
SELECT training_topic, COUNT(training_id) AS num_trainings FROM training_records GROUP BY training_topic HAVING COUNT(training_id) > 1 ORDER BY num_trainings DESC
SELECT * FROM evaluations;
SELECT evaluation_id, evaluation_date, evaluation_score FROM evaluations WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT employee_id, skill_name, skill_level FROM employee_skills ORDER BY skill_level DESC;
SELECT training_module, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM training_records GROUP BY training_module;
SELECT employee_id, training_date, training_module, completion_status FROM training_records WHERE completion_status = 'completed' ORDER BY training_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM evaluations WHERE evaluation_score > 80 ORDER BY evaluation_date DESC;
SELECT evaluation_id, employee_id, evaluation_date FROM evaluations WHERE employee_id = 123 AND evaluation_score > 70;
SELECT * FROM evaluations WHERE evaluation_score < 60 AND evaluation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT employee_id, skill_name, skill_level FROM employee_skills WHERE skill_level >= 3 ORDER BY skill_name ASC;
SELECT employee_id, training_module, training_date FROM training_records WHERE completion_status = 'Completed' ORDER BY training_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM employee_performance_evaluations;
SELECT employee_id, performance_rating FROM employee_performance_evaluations WHERE evaluation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_id, skill_name, proficiency_level FROM employee_skills ORDER BY proficiency_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_training_records WHERE training_type = 'Technical Training' ORDER BY training_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, new_job_title, promotion_date FROM employee_career_progression WHERE promotion_date < '2022-06-01';
SELECT * FROM employee_performance_evaluations ORDER BY evaluation_date DESC, performance_rating ASC;
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(*) AS evaluation_count FROM employee_performance_evaluations GROUP BY employee_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;

SELECT e.employee_id, e.skill_name, s.proficiency_level FROM employee_skills s JOIN employee_info e ON s.employee_id = e.employee_id WHERE s.proficiency_level >= 4 ORDER BY e.employee_id, s.skill_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM employee_training_records WHERE training_type LIKE '%soft skills%' ORDER BY training_date DESC;
SELECT e.employee_id, e.new_job_title, p.promotion_date FROM employee_career_progression p JOIN employee_info e ON p.employee_id = e.employee_id WHERE p.new_job_title = 'Manager';
SELECT * FROM evaluations;
SELECT employee_id, performance_rating, evaluation_date FROM evaluations ORDER BY performance_rating DESC;
SELECT employee_id, evaluation_date, feedback FROM evaluations WHERE evaluation_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT training_topic, duration_hours FROM training_records WHERE duration_hours >= 2;
SELECT employee_name, department, hire_date FROM employees ORDER BY hire_date;
SELECT * FROM evaluations WHERE employee_id = 100 ORDER BY evaluation_date DESC;
SELECT employee_name, position FROM employees WHERE department = 'Sales' AND hire_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT skill_name, skill_category, description FROM skills WHERE skill_category = 'Programming' ORDER BY skill_name ASC;

SELECT employee_name, training_topic, duration_hours FROM employees INNER JOIN training_records ON employees.employee_id = training_records.employee_id WHERE training_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT AVG(performance_rating) AS avg_rating, COUNT(*) AS total_evaluations FROM evaluations GROUP BY employee_id HAVING COUNT(*) >= 5 ORDER BY avg_rating DESC;
